feed.title: GitHub C# Daily Trending
feed.subtitle: Daily Trending of C# in GitHub

entry.title: 2dust/clashN
entry.summary:
A clash client for Windows, support clash core and Clash.Meta core

clashN

A clash client for Windows, supports Clash core and Clash.Meta core

How to use

  • If you are new to this, please download clashN-Core.zip from releases
  • Otherwise, please download clashN.zip (you will also need to download Clash core into the same folder with clashN.exe)
  • Run clashN.exe

Requirements

  • Microsoft .NET 6.0 Desktop Runtime (or download this file directly: windowsdesktop-runtime-6.0.7-win-x64.exe)
  • Clash core https://github.com/Dreamacro/clash/releases
  • Clash.Meta core https://github.com/MetaCubeX/Clash.Meta/releases

entry.title: kkokosa/dotnet-counters-ui
entry.summary:
Multiplatform UI tool for observing .NET counters, written and maintained by an awesome contributors from Dotnetos communityðŸŒ¶

dotnet-counters-ui

Cross-platform UI tool for observing .NET counters, like it was possible on Windows with Performance Counters and Performance Monitor in .NET Framework times. Windows, Linux and macOS supported thanks to Avalonia.

Windows Linux
